TopicTitle: Basic flight tutorial gets out of orbit?

Articles.Content:
Is the flight control tutorial supposed to get you out of orbit. Or is it cuz I held the rotating button? 
(Seems like a stretch but it’s the only thing I did different from the other time I did it)

how would spinning help tho? Does it cut through the air or something?

 

or is the starter solid booster op?

idk if this is a bug, if it is it’s really funny.
